      increment - increment to add to the URL

      Deprecated.
      the above, except if isIncrementingChapterList() returns true this will be used in its stead
      Parameters:

      increment - What increment to use
      Returns:
      NovelPage of parsed chapters
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any error occurs

    • getLatestURL

      java.lang.String getLatestURL​(int page)
      If there is a latest page, use this to return a certain page. Starts at 1 onwards
      Parameters:
      page - page number
      Returns:
      string URL of the next latest page
